main event: A pilot spotted a large, circular object over 6,000 feet in altitude at Mitchell AFB, New York on January 21, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as very light in color, with a diameter of 20-30 feet.
The object made tight turns and had a locking or oscillating motion.
No other details about the pilot or the incident are provided in the report.
The report appears to be from a Project Blue Book case file.
